items.text_for_match: Grealish shines in Everton's first win at new stadium Jack Grealish gets two assists as Iliman Ndiaye and James Garner score to give Everton a 2-0 win over Brighton & Hove Albion and a strong start to life at the Hill Dickinson stadium. Jack Grealish gets two assists as Iliman Ndiaye and James Garner score to give Everton a 2-0 win over Brighton & Hove Albion and a strong start to life at the Hill Dickinson stadium.

items.ja: Rowe joins Bologna after Marseille team-mate fight
items.en: Rowe joins Bologna after Marseille team-mate fight
items.text_for_match: Rowe joins Bologna after Marseille team-mate fight England Under-21 Euros winner Jonathan Rowe joins Serie A side Bologna following the fall-out from his fight with former Marseille team-mate Adrien Rabiot. England Under-21 Euros winner Jonathan Rowe joins Serie A side Bologna following the fall-out from his fight with former Marseille team-mate Adrien Rabiot.

items.ja: Fernandes misses penalty as Man Utd draw at Fulham
items.en: Fernandes misses penalty as Man Utd draw at Fulham
items.text_for_match: Fernandes misses penalty as Man Utd draw at Fulham Bruno Fernandes misses a penalty in the first half as Manchester United draw 1-1 against Fulham at Craven Cottage. Bruno Fernandes misses a penalty in the first half as Manchester United draw 1-1 against Fulham at Craven Cottage.

items.ja: The making of Spain and Arsenal's humble magician
items.en: The making of Spain and Arsenal's humble magician
items.text_for_match: The making of Spain and Arsenal's humble magician The inside story of Ballon d'Or nominee Mariona Caldentey's journey to becoming one of the world's best footballers. items.ja: Skill, confidence & laughs - schoolboy Dowman takes to Premier League
items.en: Skill, confidence & laughs - schoolboy Dowman takes to Premier League
items.text_for_match: Skill, confidence & laughs - schoolboy Dowman takes to Premier League Max Dowman becomes Arsenal's second-youngest player and wins a penalty on his Premier League debut against Leeds aged 15 years and 234 days. Max Dowman becomes Arsenal's second-youngest player and wins a penalty on his Premier League debut against Leeds aged 15 years and 234 days.

items.ja: 'In our DNA' - how the Scots took over Italian football
items.en: 'In our DNA' - how the Scots took over Italian football
items.text_for_match: 'In our DNA' - how the Scots took over Italian football With six of the Scotland squad lining up in Serie A this season, BBC Sport looks at how Scottish players took over Italian football. With six of the Scotland squad lining up in Serie A this season, BBC Sport looks at how Scottish players took over Italian football.
